product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit - Large
long_description: The large Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima, Thule and Inno compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately). The Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit attaches to your cargo box so you can easily slide your cargo box on and off the Switchblade Crossbars without tools. 6061 aluminum components are machined for precision and feature anodizing for strength and durability. Stainless-steel fasteners and tough nylon provide long-term durability, light weight, and a high strength-to-weight ratio. Works with Yakima Skybox LOPRO, Skybox 16, Skybox 18, Skybox 21, Rocketbox Pro 14 (not included). Works with Thule Hyper XL, Sonic XXL, Sonic XL, Sonic L, Force XL, Force L, Pulse XL, Pulse L, Atlantis 1800 (not included). Works with Inno Shadow 18, Shadow 16, Shadow 15, Shadow 14, Flex Top Aero, Air Cruiser, Low Down Cruiser, Ridge Box, Stream Box M (not included). Kit also works with the SmartStorage Wall Storage Unit (sold separately), so you can securely mount your cargo box in the garage when not in use.
short_description: The large Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima, Thule and Inno compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
